description: A strange black liquid that smells like death itself.  The first step towards creating the elixir of life, allegedly.  Drinking this will rapidly recover pain, at the expense of temporary sluggishness.
//: Uncommon but still producible, medical items generally shot up in value post-cataclysm.

use_action.activation_message: You drink the potion and feel a strange numbness spread through your body.

description: A strange white liquid with a scent that makes your nose itch.  The second step towards creating the elixir of life, allegedly.  Drinking this will strengthen the body, lowering other attributes and draining fatigue for the duration.

use_action.activation_message: You drink the potion and feel wicked power spread through your body.

description: A strange yellow liquid with an intoxicating smell to it.  The third step towards creating the elixir of life, allegedly.  Drinking this will enhance your speed, dexterity, and perception.  In exchange it will lower strength and intelligence, and intermittently drain stamina.

use_action.activation_message: You drink the potion and feel a sudden tension spread through your body.

description: A strange reddish liquid that gives off a sweet smell.  The elixir of life, or merely a mimicry?  Drinking this will cure a number of ailments, and heal a bit of damage.  It can heal bleeding, stave off infection or poison, and purge some diseases including fungal infection.  It can't cure deep bites or spores unless they take hold as full-blown infections, however.

A strange liquid that looks like mercury, albeit quite a bit less dense and significantly less toxic.  Drinking it will imbue you with magical energy.  However, it has no use to blood mages or pattern sorcerers.

Each dose will restore 750 mana.

//: Not to be confused with healing potions
description: A strange green liquid with an intoxicating smell to it.  A side-path on the road to the elixir of life.  Drinking this will enhance your health and resistance to disease, but you must maintain a continual weekly regimen or suffer ill-health should you fail.

use_action.activation_message: You drink the potion and feel pleasant warmth spread through your body.

description: A strange orange liquid with a dull shine.  A side-path on the road to the elixir of life.  Drinking this will keep you comfortable in the heat of summer or the chill of winter, at the cost of any pain you suffer being even more painful than normal.

use_action.activation_message: You drink the potion and feel relaxed.

description: A strange gray liquid with that sloshes thickly.  A side-path on the road to the elixir of life.  Drinking this will make you immune to poison, disease, and infection, but reduce your healing speed.

use_action.activation_message: You drink the potion and feel relaxed.

//: Technically carmine is purpleish-red, not black and red.  Lower base healing than water talisman, but no side effects.
description: Patches of cloth steeped in an alchemical mixture, forming a poultice that refines and focuses its effects.  Its healing effect is focused on a single limb, and can purge infected wounds before they become septic.  However, it loses its effect on deeper ailments, only staving off blood loss and spores, while providing some painkilling effect.

//: Citrine isn't quite white-yellow either, but jasmine incense would imply the flower rather than the color.
description:
An alchemical mixture permeating a combustible base of charcoal or resin, resulting in a peculiar sort of incense.  Using it will invigorate the user with a focused effect similar to the potions originally used to make it.  Rather than affecting strength and speed, it will directly restore a large burst of stamina and fatigue.

Each use will restore 30 fatigue, and 3000 stamina.

A congealed liquid vaguely resembling blood, seemingly pulsing and stirring with a life of its own.  The work of incomplete research into something called the Dragonblood Sacrament, it can permanently change the body and mind.  Without the original source of this power however, it can only go so far.

A small set of dice carved from otherworldly bones.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will grant a temporary speed and agility-enhancing effect."
//: Magic seals are all explicitly a post-cataclysm development, as this path towards development of natural magic did not exist without more monsters to study.

description:
A small cabochon of dark, shimmering ivory.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will anoint you with an ivory halo, granting you sight beyond sight."

A sharp needle carved from a monstrous thorn.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will grant protection against parasites and the Mycus."

A small token carved from a wicked stinger.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will stun all hostiles in the area around you."

A shimmering disc carved from a seemingly meteoric material.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will infuse the essence of iron into your skin, providing increased protection at the cost of greater encumbrance and weight."

A small ornament of vibrant purple petals.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will grant protection against paralytic effects and other hindrances, along with briefly freezing time."

A tangled knot of flowing, molded bone.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will staunch bleeding and mend wounds, though overuse can be harmful in the long run."

A tangled knot of flowing, molded bone.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will swap the position of you and an enemy, confusing them briefly and creating fog near your emergence point."

A shimmering disc carved from a seemingly meteoric material.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will allow you to travel underwater without the need to breathe and will protect your possessions while there."

A shimmering disc carved from a seemingly meteoric material.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will grant temporary resistance to heat and smoke, but not direct contact with fire."

A curiously-refractive gem carved from an unearthly blue orb.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will grant a temporary boost to perception, and night vision."

name.str: Magic Seal (The Eye of the Storm)
name.str_pl: Magic Seals (The Eye of the Storm)

description:
A small chunk of carved otherworldly amber.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will grant you immunity to lightning, at the cost of slowing you down."

A miniature dagger carved from strange ivory.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will grant a temporary boost to strength."

name.str: Magic Seal (A Spread of Rampant Green)
name.str_pl: Magic Seals (A Spread of Rampant Green)

description:
A small ornament of woven petals, an otherworldly vibrant red in hue.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will conjure an eruption of the living forest, at the location you target."

//: ID retained to avoid breaking stuff.
description:
A piece of unnaturally dark stone, shaped into an eccentric design.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will anoint you with an obsidian halo, granting a temporary defensive effect that will strike your attackers blind."

A small sliver of strange crystal, flickering as though distant storms rage within.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will call forth lightning all around you, with close enemies taking double damage."

An small winged figurine, carved from a strange iridescent stone.  Activate it to focus your mind and create a magic sign, expending the item entirely.
"This spell will grant a blessing that protects against certain anomalous threats."
